summary: One of my students brought an Iron Man napkin to lunch and said, “I love my superhero napkin.”  I was like, “Me too.”
body:
One of my students brought an Iron Man napkin to lunch and said, “I love my superhero napkin.” 

I was like, “Me too.”

blog.name: thedailyimagines
blog.title:
The Daily Imagines
(Requests Are Open)
blog.description:
Use the inbox to submit your request!

Search “Masterlist” to see what I write for.

Requests are open Monday thru Thursday, CLOSED Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

NO PORNBOTS ALLOWED

summary:
Imagine being Tony’s kid and meeting Peter.
“Did you build that?!?! That’s so cool, it’s like a baby AT-ST!”
“You’re a nerd, you...
body:
Imagine being Tony’s kid and meeting Peter.

“Did you build that?!?! That’s so cool, it’s like a baby AT-ST!”

“You’re a nerd, you know that right?”

“Excuse you y/n I’m the king of nerds.”

“You’re both nerds, okay?”

~~~~~~~~

AT-ST is the two legged robot from Star Wars.

.

I don’t own the above gifs, all credits go to the owners.

summary: In the name of love
body:
In the name of love

It all happened so fast. One minute Obi was pushing him out of the window. The next second a strong grip was holding him and swinging him out of danger. Tony looked up feeling dazed, Spiderman has just saved his life. And Obi was for sure going to jail.

The hero carefully sat down the billionaire on top of a rooftop. Without asking to see if the man was okay, the webbed hero took off again. To deal with Stane, Tony guessed. 

After he was nice and safe, Tony decided to do some research on the infamous hero. Spiderman has been active for five years. The public has mixed views on the said hero and Peter Parker was the man under the mask.

With doe-eyes and soft brown hair, Tony found himself in a trance with the younger man. At age twenty-one, he works at a newspaper that slanders Spiderman’s name. Tony’s heart was beating faster than normal. 

And in a good way. Unlike his time held in captive. The man was surprised when it turned up that Peter wasn’t a fan of the Tony Stark. But Tony believed he could change his mind. And hopefully thank him properly.

summary: SOS.
body:
SOS.

I JUST MET SOMEONE IN REAL LIFE THAT THINKS TONY STARK IS SELFISH. SHE TOLD ME IF I WAS SO SURE HE WAS UNSELFISH, THEN TO WRITE A 25 PAGE ESSAY ON WHY.


RISE UP, TONY STANS! GIVE ME ALL YOUR REASONS BECAUSE THIS GIRL IS GETTING THAT ESSAY.


@irondadtexts @irondadheadcanons @parkrstark @losingmymindtonight @caraminha @keep-a-bucket-full-of-stars @tonys-parenting-blog

summary: Koschei
title: Koschei
body:
“It was beautiful. Like nothing I’ve ever seen before. It was like an everlasting sunset on a plane of nothingness.” - Ava Collins

Pulvis et umbra sumus

I sit silently by myself on the quinjet. I’m trying to think about all the different ways this is going to go down. I like to act tough, but I’m scared shitless. I am sweating and pale and I’m…

Read more…
